unnormalised: For students facing financial constraints, the PM Scholarship Scheme offers ₹2000/month for boys and ₹2250/month for girls pursuing technical or professional courses. Application deadline is typically 31/07 each year. Also, check out the National Means cum Merit Scholarship, providing ₹12000 p.a. for students of class 9-12, especially beneficial for those from EWS backgrounds. Don't forget to visit the National Scholarship Portal (NSP) for more details and eligibility criteria!
normalised: For students facing financial constraints, the P-M Scholarship Scheme offers rupee two thousand per month for boys and rupee two thousand two hundred and fifty per month for girls pursuing technical or professional courses. Application deadline is typically thirty first July each year. Also, check out the National Means cum Merit Scholarship, providing rupee twelve thousand per annum for students of class nine to twelve, especially beneficial for those from E-W-S backgrounds. Don't forget to visit the National Scholarship Portal (N-S-P) for more details and eligibility criteria!
